net.starype.minigameapi.features.events

Class JoinLeaveManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.starype.minigameapi.features.events.JoinLeaveManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Feature, Linkable, org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class JoinLeaveManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener, Feature, Linkable

    JoinLeaveManager is a class that can be used as a feature alone or as an under feature depending of the GameDivision instance, to manage connections and disconnections of players.

    It also implements the Listener interface because it contains a PlayerJoinEvent and a PlayerQuitEvent.

    Author:
    Askigh, Steven

      • JoinLeaveManager

        public JoinLeaveManager(MiniGameCore core,
                        org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin main,
                        JoinLeaveAction defaultAction)
        Parameters:
        core - The MiniGame instance you want to complete with this feature
        main - The Instance of the class extending JavaPlugin. Necessary to register the events
        defaultAction - Define the default action applied, see onJoin / onLeave functions for further information. May be null without any problems.

    • Method Detail

      • link

        public void link()
        If link function is called, it means that the defaultAction won't be called anymore except if withDefaultActions(true) is called, and no action is defined for the current state.
        Specified by:
        link in interface Linkable
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if GameDivision has not already been added as a feature in the MiniGameCore instance

      • withDefaultActions

        public JoinLeaveManager withDefaultActions(boolean withDefaultAction)
        Parameters:
        withDefaultAction - : Whether the programm should use the default action if instance if linked but no specific action is defined for the current state
        Returns:
        the instance of JoinLManager used to call this function
